cleaned_text: COVID-19 vaccination: for people with a weakened immune system Information on the third and booster doses for people with a weakened immune system. Documents Details This leaflet provides information on the third and booster doses of coronavirus (COVID-19) vaccine for people with a weakened immune system. Printed copies of this leaflet are available free to order in available to order. A [Braille version](https://www.healthpublications.gov.uk/ViewArticle.html?sp=Scovid19vaccineforthosewithaweakenedimmunesystembraille) of this leaflet is available to order. An [audio version](https://www.healthpublications.gov.uk/ViewArticle.html?sp=Scovid19vaccineforthosewithaweakenedimmunesystemaudio) is available to download. A [British Sign Language (BSL) video](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-british-sign-language-resources) of this guide is available to view and download.
